channel.title: Official moparscape?
channel.description:
When I first joined Moparscape I actually thought there would be a "Moparscape" server and was disappointed to find out there wasn't.
What I suggest is a official Moparscape server for the Moparscape community. Obviously a lot of rules would need to be put in place for this to work how I imagine, I don't know if this hasn't already been done due to legal issues but if MITB can host a status page advertising hundreds of private servers surely he could host a server however I don't know much about legal stuff so I could just be being naive.
The server could work just like the minecraft server we have(moparcraft). I'm willing to listen to all arguments for and against but I for one would love to see this. It's late so I'll expand this more if this gets past approval by you mods.

item.title: Official moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

It is in the planning phase, but I can’t go beyond that. You’ll learn more as it progresses. Thanks for the suggestion.

Read full topic
